name: Teamwork: A Platformer
description:
-WASD and Arrow Keys

-n to skip, and r to restart!
-space to switch characters
-GET BOTH CHARACTERS IN THE PORTAL
-s to use an item, the only exception is the grappling hook which you click in which direction you want it to go!

-if you lag into a wall, your teammate, or something just doesnt look right like stuff floating in the air, just press r to restart!

-IF THE GROUND IS TOO SMALL PRESS U
Slightly laggy (sorry)

Here is a step by step on how to beat each level!

#1. go to the portal, space to switch characters, get both characters in the portal.

#2. Press space while in midair above the pit, then use your partner to jump on the other suspended over the void, flip the switch.

#3 Use your partner to jump up onto the platform. Press all levers.

#4 Collect the item, press s by the void to get a super jump!

#5 Collect the item, click to shoot it! It will pull you to where you shot! Flip the lever and jump up the trampoline.

#6 Press down the pressure plate, use the other character to get the key using the trampoline the pressure plate reveals. Touch the gate and press s to open it!

#7 Use the grappling hook to jump over the saw. Press the lever to let your partner through.

#8 Get the jump boost item, use one character to press the pressure plate. Once the wall blocking the lever disappears, use the jump boost and jump up. Press the lever. Go into the portal followed by your partner!

#9 Hold down the pressure plate. Then jump up to where the lever is, avoid the spikes. Switch the lever! Then your the trampoline the lever revealed to jump up!

#10 Get the item then leave?

#11 Use your partner to jump to the ledge. Press the lever. Have your partner jump across the void on the revealed trampolines. Have them get the key. Switch characters and open the gate. Then get into the portal.

#12 Use your partner to jump up. Hold the pressure plate. Have your partner go through the passage that appeared. Have them flip the lever, go through the passage the lever opened. Go into the portal.

#13 Using your partner jump up! Then kill the enemy and the gate should open! Go into the portal.

#14 Get the grappling hook, jump and throw it onto the ceiling beyond the saw. Flip the lever and go over the trampolines revealed.

#15 Cross the spikes, hold down the pressure plate. Have your partner jump onto the platform above spawn on the revealed trampoline. Have them flip the switch, jump on the trampoline revealed by the switch, flip the switch the let your partner to the portal, go into the portal!

#16 Boss fight, don't die, press colour-coded levers when they appear. Wait until the boss is dead, then you win! =)
